pageTitle: lightweight MVC: Implements the MVC design pattern - PHP Classes
textBeforeTable: martin barker This package implements the MVC design pattern. It provides based model, view and controller class that should be derived to implement new applications. It can get data from the browser secured with addslashes to prevent uses exploiting the system though GET, POST or URL data. It uses MySQLi for database access.     Author   Description PHP 5, Libraries, Design Patterns 5.2 GNU Lesser Genera... lightweight-mvc 3.0     Categories   PHP version   License   Version
